attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the high amount of sugar content in certain breakfast products, the government should enforce a cap on the amount of sugar content to help maintain a healthy balanced diet. Therefore the high sugar content cereals should only be allowed to be classed as dessert.

rejection.details: Please remove reference to specific companies and their products.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
